item.title: Jessica add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "And in that moment, I swear we were infinite." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "What came first – the music or the misery? Did I listen to the music because I was miserable? Or was I miserable because I listened to the music? Do all those records turn you into a melancholy person?" -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "The nurse knew that those who really love, love in silence, with deeds and not with words." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "People were always getting ready for tomorrow. I didn't believe in that. Tomorrow wasn't getting ready for them. It didn't even know they were there." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Gabriel Bá
item.description: "It doesn't matter where you're from - or how you feel... There's always peace in a strong cup of coffee." -- Gabriel Bá

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "A good compilation tape, like breaking up, is hard to do and takes ages longer than it might seem. You've got to kick off with a killer, to grab the attention. Then you've got to take it up a notch, or cool it off a notch…oh, there are a lot of rules." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Just because you're an atheist, that doesn't mean you wouldn't love for things to have reasons for why they are." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Together, they would watch everything that was so carefully planned collapse, and they would smile at the beauty of destruction." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Garth Stein
item.description: "That which we manifest is before us; we are the creators of our own destiny. Be it through intention or ignorance, our successes and our failures have been brought on by none other than ourselves." -- Garth Stein

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "There was never yet an uninteresting life. Such a thing is an impossibility. Inside of the dullest exterior there is a drama, a comedy, and a tragedy." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "He was painfully shy, which, as is often the manner of the painfully shy, he overcompensated for by being too loud at the wrong times." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "This may be the most important proposition revealed by history: 'At the time, no one knew what was coming." -- Haruki Murakami
